id.description: The unique identifier for the ad account.

updated_at.description: The timestamp when the ad account details were last updated.

created_at.description: The timestamp when the ad account was created.

name.description: The name or title of the ad account.

type.description: The type or category of the ad account.

status.description: The current status or state of the ad account.

organization_id.description: The ID of the organization that owns the ad account.

funding_source_ids.description: IDs of the funding sources linked to the ad account.

currency.description: The currency used for financial transactions within the ad account.

timezone.description: The timezone setting for the ad account operations.

advertiser_organization_id.description: The ID of the organization that is advertising on the platform.

billing_center_id.description: The ID of the billing center associated with the ad account.

billing_type.description: The type of billing arrangement for the ad account.

agency_representing_client.description: The agency representing the client for ad account management.

client_paying_invoices.description: Indicates if the client is responsible for paying the invoices.

regulations.description: Regulatory information associated with the ad account.

restricted_delivery_signals.description: Signals or content types subject to delivery restrictions.
